helpMeChargeDescription: Answer a few questions to find the best Tesla charging solution for your lifestyle.
helpMeChargeKeywords: Tesla charging recommendations, Tesla charging solutions, best EV charger, Tesla charging, Tesla home charging, EV charging, EV home charging, Destination Charging, Supercharging

landingPage.subtitle: Find the charging solution that meets your needs by answering questions about your home, driving habits and lifestyle.
landingPage.title: Help Me Charge

questionHomeType.title: What type of building do you live in?

questionParkingType.title: Where do you park when you're home?

questionOutletAccess.title: Is there outlet access near where you park?

home.title: Home
home.description: Charge anytime of day or night in your garage, driveway or parking spot.

workplace.title: Workplace
workplace.description: Plug in during business hours and leave the office, worry-free.

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: Relax and recharge at restaurants, hotels and shopping centers.

onTheGoCarousel.title: Charging is Easy and Fast
onTheGoCarousel.subtitle: Whether it's daily commuting or cross country road trips, we have you covered.

navigate.title: Navigate
navigate.description: Enter a destination and Trip Planner finds charging stations on the way.

plugIn.title: Plug In
plugIn.description: Charge automatically — no need to swipe a credit card.

relax.title: Relax
relax.description: Grab a coffee, stretch your legs or play a game.

monitor.title: Monitor
monitor.description: View your charge status in real time and get ready to go.

wallConnector.title: Wall Connector
wallConnector.description: Plug in at home and start your day with a charged battery. Charge from 0-80% in 6 hours.

mobileConnector.title: Mobile Connector
mobileConnector.description: Portable and convenient, charge wherever there's an outlet. Add 3-30 miles of range per hour.

chargingModule.title: Charge On The Go

supercharger.title: Supercharger
supercharger.description: The fastest option away from home. Charge from 0 to 80% in just 25 minutes.

destinationCharging.title: Destination Charging
destinationCharging.description: Charging in urban and rural areas. Charge from 0 to 80% in 6 hours.

chargingModule.disclaimer: *Depending on vehicle age/model, adapter and charging output

chargingMap.title: Go Anywhere, Charge Everywhere
chargingMap.subtitle: Enter a location below to view the number of chargers available near you.

search.error: No chargers available. Try searching in a different location.

consultation.title: Experience Tesla Technology
consultation.description: Schedule a Demo Drive or connect with a Tesla Advisor for comprehensive guidance on charging solutions.

contactForm.title: Schedule a Consultation
contactForm.description: Tesla Advisors can walk you through our charging products, charging network and answer any questions you may have. Provide your information to receive a call from one of our advisors.
contactForm.disclaimer: By clicking "Submit", I authorize Tesla to contact me about this request via the contact information I provide. I understand calls or texts may use automatic or computer-assisted dialing or pre-recorded messages. Normal message and data rates apply. I can opt out at any time in the Tesla app or by unsubscribing. This consent is not required to complete your request.
contactForm.successSubtitle: A Tesla Advisor will give you a call as soon as possible.
contactForm.failureSubtitle: We were not able to process your request. Try again later.

disclaimers.outlet: Depending on vehicle age/model, adapter and charging output.
disclaimers.map: Tesla will store the address for future planning purposes pursuant to the Privacy Notice. The address will be anonymized and aggregated.

chargingMapComponent.title: Find Your Charge
chargingMapComponent.subtitle: View the network of Tesla Superchargers and Destination Chargers available near you.
